column4: has anyone here successfully setup a samba share with xboxmediacenter (or a windows machine) and ubuntu? or any kind of share for that matter?
you checkout the samba page on the wiki?
well, ftp is doable, if you can't get samba to work.
Make an FTP user, make his home folder your windows drive.
in users and groups (system > admin > users and groups) make a new user (name it whatever) and set his homedir to whereever your widnows drive is mounted
if you copy your ubuntu line in fstab (if you only have one ubuntu drive, remove the ,errors=remount-ro, so it just says 'default') that should be fine for yourwindows drive
